page.shortlink: api objects security object password has expired method
page.description: Gets whether or not the password of the specified user has expired.

argument.name: L
argument.description: Return type, .T. if the user was removed from the role; otherwise .F.

argument.name: UserName as C
argument.description: Optional. The user name to check for password expiration. If no user name is used then the password expiration check is done for the current user.

page.discussion: Context.Security.PasswordHasExpired() gets whether or not the password of the specified user has expired. The maximum lifetime of a password is defined in the security settings. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
